com.tradewc.neuralnetwork
Interface StockMarketNeuralNetwork

All Superinterfaces:
Observable, Runnable, Serializable
All Known Implementing Classes:
StockPriceNeuralNetwork
public interface StockMarketNeuralNetwork
extends Observable, Runnable, Serializable

An interface which gives common methods for a stock market neural network.

Author:
Adam John Markham
